expertInfo.summary: Unable to check account Status, Radius session and physical condition
expertInfo.prompt: Symptom: Unable to identify potential issue due to all information not available
expertInfo.nextBestAction: Inbound: CSP to: 1) Identify with customer whether issue related account, billing or technical. Proceed with manual troubleshooting. 1.1) Account Issue - Lodge IRIS and create SR and assign to Backend. 1.2) Billing - Escalate to Billing Team if required (Follow current process) 1.3) Technical - if customer having problem accessing the internet, kindly create CTT and CTT Activity.
expertInfo.actionTaken: Reset Port (If customer not using the VOBB number)
expertInfo.nextEscalation: Billing - Billing Team Technical Performance : CC - Backend Offline : SDZ
